about_the_game:
This is a Mystery DLC, instal it you can play with 4 ladies, it contains 8 stages.

How to play:
Click ladies' body to Interactive with them.

Feature:
-4 characters
-8 stages
-Fully animation
-Voice
-8 Achievements

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 4 GB available space
